general.gigTitle: develop responsive odoo website, dynamic odoo themes

sellerCard.oneLiner: Take your Business from Good to Great
sellerCard.description:
I am Asma Ahad. I'm not just a Fullstack Web Developer; I'm your go-to tech partner. My journey is a tapestry of coding triumphs, woven with the threads of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, .Net and React.

What sets me apart? 
It's my knack for transforming complex requirements into user-friendly web applications. Whether it's a bustling startup or a large enterprise, I've been there, coded that!

Above these I also lead a Team of developers from different aspects of IT fields.

Specialties:
+ SEO
+ Content Marketing
+ Social Media Marketing
+ Odoo development

description.content:
I specialize in creating fully responsive and visually appealing Odoo websites. Whether you need a brand new site from scratch or a custom theme tailored to your specific needs, I've got you covered.

From layout to functionality, I will ensure your Odoo website not only looks great but performs seamlessly across all devices.


Me and my team can do:

  • Odoo custom website (corporate and e-commerce sites)
  • Odoo custom theme (owl.js, html, css, scss, js)
  • Odoo bug fixing, and troubleshooting
  • Odoo dynamic snippets development
  • Third party payment gateways integration
  • Customized Odoo shop and cart page


Let's discuss and bring your vision to life with a professional and dynamic Odoo website.


NOTE: Discuss before custom order. The cost may vary depending on your requirements.

milestones.title: Requirements
milestones.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

steps.title: Onboarding Questionnaire
steps.description: You'll fill out a detailed questionnaire / brief.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment:
first, I would like to thank the brilliant team
they made the things done smoothly in a time 
I will go with them for coming tasks

to discuss with them everydetail and their advices came from deeply experienced 
thanks again

I had great success using this freelancer for my odoo project and will not hesitate to recommend him to everyone who has questions in regard of Odoo. Workflow, homepage, inventory.... I was very much surprised of the depth of knowledge and the motivation to help me! A true expert!

Outstanding Work!

I am very satisfied with the website delivered. The work is professional, well-crafted, and fully functional. Communication was fast and clear throughout the project, with great attention to detail.  

I highly recommend this service to anyone looking for reliable, efficient, and high-quality work. Thank you again for your excellent job! I won’t hesitate to come back for future projects.
Absolutely excellent all around.  The website is structured exactly as I envisioned and I was so pleased with how it turned out.
Asma did an absolutely terrific job in this project! We will for sure continue to work with her on the next projects to come.
